attributes.action: Help fix the environment, economy and quality of our lives in one easy step
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The excessive use of road transport is damaging the environment and our economy with rises in fuel and food prices.
The government must cut its spending on hyping the terror threat and spying on the UK population and instead spend this money and effort on providing public transport and rail links.
Using rail to transport goods would require goods yards and the investment in rolling stock. Transporting people on bus and train requires stations and vehicles. The new investments must use BRITISH companies (not Mercedes as in London) the government would also be able to stop pretending 15% of the country is disabled and reduce unemployment.

The actions are simple, move money from wasteful spending and spend it with British companies to provide public transport. This will save the planet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
